message Foo {
  bar Text
}
model Person {
  functions {
    read getPerson(Foo)        returns(Foo)
    write        mutatePerson(Foo) returns (           Foo      )
  }
}
===
message Foo {
    bar Text
}

model Person {
    functions {
        read getPerson(Foo) returns (Foo)
        write mutatePerson(Foo) returns (Foo)
    }
}
